description:
Swift for Windows is an open source project that provides an easy-to-use development environment for Swift programming for Windows applications.

**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: Swift for Windows is an open source project that provides an easy-to-use development environment for Swift programming for Windows applications.
author: SwiftForWindows
